      • getByProjectsAndPerson

        public static java.util.List<TListTypeBean> getByProjectsAndPerson(java.lang.Integer[] involvedProjects,
                                                   java.lang.Integer personID,
                                                   java.util.Locale locale,
                                                   boolean restrict)
        Gets the item types by projects involved in context and the person
        Parameters:
        involvedProjects -
        personID -
        locale -
        restrict - whether to restrict the item types: true a subset valid for all involved projects (any issue type change in subset is valid) false a superset valid for any involved project (certain issue change may not be possible)
        Returns:
